sentences.en: A difficult poit of developing SSFCE is slag detachability.
sentences.cn: 脱渣性是自保护药芯焊丝研制过程中的重点和难点.

sentences.en: Adding acid flyash in alkali - slag system forms alkali - flyash - slag system.
sentences.cn: 在碱 - 矿渣系统中加入酸性粉煤灰,构成碱 - 粉煤灰 - 矿渣系统.

sentences.en: All bands slag off their record companies. It's just the way it is.
sentences.cn: 所有乐队都会臭骂自己的唱片公司，都这样。

sentences.en: Furnace operation was satisfactory, although the slag was viscous and difficult to tap from the furnace.
sentences.cn: 炉子的操作情况是令人满意的, 但炉渣很粘,出料比较困难.

sentences.en: German study of slag Portland cement than Portland cement information than the.
sentences.cn: 德国研究矿渣硅酸盐水泥比普通硅酸盐水泥的信息比.

sentences.en: High production efficiency, outstanding welding quality without obvious welding slag.
sentences.cn: 生产效率高, 焊接质量好,无明显焊渣.

sentences.en: In some cases the slag can be disposed of usefully.
Millions of tons of slag now go into building roads each year.
sentences.cn: 每年有数百万吨炉渣用于铺路.

sentences.en: PDM vertical mill was studied to be used to produce ultrafine slag.
sentences.cn: 针对目前球磨机粉磨超细矿渣的缺点,本文探讨使用PDM型立磨来生产超细矿渣.

sentences.en: Slag, blowholes, and paint on unfused regions were observed at the welded junctions.
sentences.cn: 在焊接处看到了夹渣, 气孔及未熔透区的油漆.

sentences.en: Steel slag is a by - product produced in the process of steel making.
sentences.cn: 钢渣是炼钢过程中的 副产品.

sentences.en: The experiment results show that � � _ ( V _ 2 O _ 5 ) of BOF slag is about 10~ ( - 10 ) .
sentences.cn: 测定结果表明,含钒转炉钢渣的γV2O5值在 10-10 左右.

sentences.en: The oxides either leave the bath as gases, or enter the slag.
sentences.cn: 氧化物或者以气体的形式离开熔炉, 或者进入炉渣.

sentences.en: The performance of the slag cement blended with desulphurization gypsum is studied.
sentences.cn: 本文研究了脱硫石膏对矿渣水泥物理性能的影响.

sentences.en: This material is variously termed ash, clinker, cinders or slag.
sentences.cn: 这种材料有不同的名称,如灰 、 炉渣 、 煤渣或矿渣.

phrases.tran_cn: 矿渣混凝土；熔渣混凝土

trans.tran_en: a waste material similar to glass, which remains after metal has been obtained from rock
